description: Name of the application.
Platform the application is running on (e.g., iOS, Mac).
Version of the application.
Unique identifier for the client.
Country of the device's network.
Build number of the device's operating system.
Version of the device's operating system.
Release audience for the application (e.g., Production, Insider).
Specific group within the release audience.
Unique identifier for the user session.
Version of the session that was affected.
Build number of the affected session.
OS version of the affected session.
OS locale of the affected session.
Model of the device.
Timestamp when the event was received.
The rate at which this event is sampled.
Session ID of the affected process.
Type of the Unhandled Application Exit.
Identifier for the user's tenant.
Group of the user's tenant.
Type of application installation.
The fork of the release.
Hashed primary identity of the user.
Name of the sub-application if any.
